title: GMFB: NFL Draft Party
itunes:title: GMFB: NFL Draft Party
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The team talks going to Philly & the unpredictability of this year’s Draft (1:00); Reactions to meeting and interviewing Notre Dame QB DeShone Kizer (1:40) and Clemson QB DeShaun Watson on the show (6:06); On football analytics and hosting the show w/ Steve Smith, Sr. (7:53); On Leonard Fournette & the potential order of some of the top offensive players in the draft (11:03); Peter gives insight on teams floating rumors v. knowing what’s real (12:21); The team discusses Texas Tech QB Patrick Mahomes II (17:33); The excitement Christian McCaffrey (25:40); Rueben Foster (31:25) and Cooper Kupp (35:52).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
